code: import{applyMiddleware,createStore,compose}from"redux";import{createReducers}from"./allReducer";import{persistStore,persistReducer}from"redux-persist";import storage from"redux-persist/lib/storage";var persistConfig={key:'root',whitelist:['feedback','utenteLoggato'],storage:storage};var allReducers=createReducers();var persistedReducer=persistReducer(persistConfig,allReducers);export var configureStore=function configureStore(){var composeEnhancers=typeof window==="object"&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__?window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__:compose;var store=createStore(persistedReducer,composeEnhancers());var persistor=persistStore(store);return{store:store,persistor:persistor};};
